query.statement: SELECT A.CS316_PJT PJT, A.CS316_TEM TEM, A.CS316_YDT YDT, A.CS316_MDT MDT, A.CS316_SEQ SEQ, A.CS316_ADR ADR, A.CS316_TXT TXT, A.CS316_USR USR, A.CS316_PHO PHO, A.CS316_NAM NAM, A.CS316_BMT BMT, A.CS316_RQT RQT, 'Çö¿¤-'||#TEM#||'-'||SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),3,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),5,2)||'-'||(CAST((SELECT MAX(CS316_SEQ)SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST316 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS316_TEM = #TEM# AND CS316_YDT = #YDT# AND CS316_MDT = #MDT#)AS CHAR(2))) NUM, B.DTEXT2 DTEXT2, B.DTEXT3 DTEXT3, B.DTEXT4 DTEXT4 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST316 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE B ON A.CS316_TEM = B.CODE2 AND B.CODE1 = 'CS181' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS316_TEM = #TEM# AND A.CS316_YDT = #YDT# AND A.CS316_MDT = #MDT# AND A.CS316_SEQ = #SEQ#
